review_data.content: Spontaneous visit- nice salad with vegis...husband also pleased with his choice with meat. The terrace is roomy for kids and families when it's warm enough to be out. No street or ventilation noise.

review_data.title: Great food, great service, lovely atmosphere
review_data.content: Santa Lucia is a lovely Italian restaurant. The food is delicious and they are quite quick in preparing it. The service is super friendly and the atmosphere of the place is great. The prices are also quite ok for this quality in Zurich.

review_data.title: Beautiful setting, nice service, great food

review_data.title: Very good food, great personnel

review_data.title: Right around the corner
review_data.content: Great atmosphere, good food, great service and wine selection, a beautiful pizza wood burning oven and right around the corner from the Hotel and near downtown.

review_data.title: Tagliatelle in a lump.....
review_data.content: Disappointing food, service friendly even in rush hour. My tagliatelle came sticking together, could lift the entire lump with my fork out of the plate..... Porcino mushrooms tasted OK but could not save the dish.

review_data.title: Excellent food

review_data.title: Italian restaurant with a touch of art and theater
review_data.content: Nice place with beautiful design, spirit of cosy lounge theater backstage, cool people and very good cooking. Price are fair in this Zurich place near kunsthaus.

review_data.title: Good food, service is improvable
review_data.content: The Santa Lucia chain is a safe bet for a good pizza and ok pasta. So is the rather new Teatro. If the service would be better, this could be a pearl, since the child friendliness is one of a kind.
